item.Name: particles spawn radially#see particle initial offset multiplier

_field_real.name: spawn rate multiplier#the higher this number, the sooner the model is fully spawned in

_field_real_point_3d.name: source scan position#the direction in model space that the scan starts from. Ignored if do not sort vertex order flag is set above

_field_real.name: scale factor#model scale to match camera space
camera orbit period#0 means camera is stationary
particle scale#scale factor for individual particles
particle acceleration#This is the acceleration rate when particles spawn in and move to their ultimate destination. Higher numbers move faster.

particle initial offset multiplier#If flag particles spawn radially is set, this is the multiple of the particle location along the radial axis. If not, this the random spawn distance from the particle destination.

plugin._field_explanation: the following are generated from running the tool generate-loadscreen command on this tag.
